name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a seasoned Reliability Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in ensuring safety-critical standards and enhancing reliability engineering practices. My expertise encompasses risk assessment, design verification, and creating detailed method statements, ensuring compliance with industry regulations while fostering robust safety protocols.
I possess strong problem-solving skills and excel in providing technical guidance while collaborating effectively within teams. My communication abilities enable me to articulate complex technical concepts to diverse stakeholders, ensuring alignment in project objectives. In addition to my core reliability engineering focus, I have a rich background in full-stack development with technologies such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, and deep experience in **cloud** solutions with **Azure** and **AWS**. This unique blend allows me to integrate engineering methodologies seamlessly into software solutions, enhancing performance and compliance.
